part_search_results.query: Find the top suppplier websites that offer mass flow controller | None and retrieve the produc specifications
part_search_results.answer: Top suppliers include MKS Instruments, Brooks Instrument, and PerkinElmer. Specifications for PerkinElmer's model include capillary-type thermal technology and a 0-50 SCCM range.

Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find [...] # Mass Flow Controller 0-50 SCCM

## Mass Flow Controller 0-50 SCCM

Uses capillary-type thermal technology to directly measure massflow of gases. No temperature, pressure or square rootcorrections are required. Comes with an LCD display and haslinear 0 to 5 and 4 to 20 mA output. Uses an internalelectromagnetic proportional valve to control the mass flow rate.

results.title: Mass Flow Controllers
results.content:
MKS offers a comprehensive portfolio of high-performance Mass Flow Controllers (MFCs) designed to deliver exceptional precision and reliability in regulating gas flow rates. These innovative instruments are ideal for a wide range of applications in various industries, including semiconductor manufacturing, chemical processing, and research laboratories.
